description: Update a job production plan project phase revenue item.
permissions: Requires permission to update job production plan project phase revenue items for the related job production plan; access is delegated to the associated job production plan policy.
side_effects: Updates the job production plan project phase revenue item and triggers post-commit work that updates related project phase cost item actuals, caches cost-code matches, and generates a job production plan recap asynchronously.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one attribute must be provided. Quantity must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided. Project phase revenue item must be unique per job production plan. Job production plan and project phase revenue item must belong to the same project. Relationships (job-production-plan, project-phase-revenue-item) are create-only and cannot be changed via update.

flags.name: --quantity
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.
